message: nice basic idea executed pretty well.  congrats.

very cool project - with lots of possibilities. i would also think about consumer stuff - like say a bunch of dudes want to go hit some bars - make notes etc. You could pull in some foursquare/yelp/whatever data and people can make plans
also a meetup like option or an evite - tie to reviews of any addresses that you add - a lot of potential
looks good - now how do you monetize?
Nice! You might as well try to get directions to show up on your own site instead of sending them to Google Maps or other external links.
